mapper.insert: insert into w_parameter (parameter_id, parameter_firstname, parameter_sname, parameter_thirdname, parameter_fourname, parameter_specification) values (#{parameterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parameterFirstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameterSname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameterThirdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameterFourname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameterSpecification,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update w_parameter set parameter_firstname = #{parameterFirstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter_sname = #{parameterSname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter_thirdname = #{parameterThirdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter_fourname = #{parameterFourname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter_specification = #{parameterSpecification,jdbcType=INTEGER} where parameter_id = #{parameterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select parameter_id, parameter_firstname, parameter_sname, parameter_thirdname, parameter_fourname, parameter_specification from w_parameter where parameter_id = #{parameterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select parameter_id, parameter_firstname, parameter_sname, parameter_thirdname, parameter_fourname, parameter_specification from w_parameter
